701579f-a.text:
Paul Avenue, south of Bedford Park Boulevard, showing a coffee shack that serves the laborers working on the construction of the new thoroughfare and the Hunter College grounds. On the right is visible the elevated structure of the I.R.T. subway, on Jerome AVenue.
May 5, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.

701579f-a.original_title: Bronx: Paul Avenue - Bedford Park Boulevard
